item.title: Just some thing i need some help on: realy easy prob
item.dc:creator: @qsmith qsmith
item.description:
@qsmith wrote:

ok i have been working on my wood cutting skill and i have it to where is a player has a rune axe they can cut a tree, preetey easy stuff. but the player has to have the rune axe in there invetory like in my code here:

if(playerHasItem(1359) == true)
{
if (actionTimer == 0)
sendMessage(“you get a log!”);
setAnimation(875);
addItem(1511, 1);
addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[8]), 8);
actionTimer = 8;
}
else if(playerHasItem(1359) == false)
{
sendMessage(“you need a rune axe to get the wood!”);
sendMessage(“or you need your rune axe in your invitory and not as a weapon !”);
sendMessage(“or you need lvl 50 woodcutting !”);
}
break;

–see i wont it to say some thing like:

if(playerHasItem(1359) == true && playerhasweapon(1359))

but that wont work any other ways i can do this?

Read full topic
item.source: Just some thing i need some help on: realy easy prob
